titleStmt.title: Authentication of a Subscript / Confirmation of Delivery of a Petition / Petition of Skaptopareni / Quoted Proceedings of a Hearing before the Provincial Governor / Subscriptio of Gordian III

msContents.summary: Inscription comprises several texts: authentication of an imperial subscript, petition, partial proceedings of a hearing before a provincial governor, and imperial subscript. Aurelius Pyrrhus acted as a representative for his community at Scaptopara, which had been burdened by troops boarding and quartering, at a hearing before the governor of Thrace. The inscription was probably commissioned by Aurelius Pyrrhus to celebrate his efforts, though their efficacy is uncertain.

history.provenance: Original lost. Partial squeeze held at the Corpus Inscriptionum Latinarum, Berlin-Brandenburgische Akademie der Wissenschaften, Berlin
